description:
The SDSN Great Lakes a community of universities, research centers, and knowledge institutions.

Our Regional Network is hosted by the University of Rwanda - College of Business and Economics. We aim to teach sustainable development, support solution initiatives, and localize the SDGs in Central and East Africa.
footerContent:
Interested in joining our mission?

Join our network of problem solvers and contribute to practical solutions for sustainable development and the 2030 Agenda. See more details here.
title: Footer Information
